product_title: Belt Collar Long Sleeve Stretch Crepe Dress
product_description: A dress so stylishly at odds with itself cuts a classic A-line silhouette framed by billowed sleeves that also are slit from shoulder to cuff.
product_details_and_care:
A dress so stylishly at odds with itself cuts a classic A-line silhouette framed by billowed sleeves that also are slit from shoulder to cuff. An adjustable belted mock-neck collar tops a V-notched keyhole on this shapely bodice.
38" length
Hidden back-zip closure
Mock neck with belt closure and keyhole
Long sleeves with slit sides and two-button cuffs
Lined
95% polyester, 5% spandex
Dry clean
Imported
Women's Clothing
Item #6106435
